summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6128 for the improvement of Yancy Street from Avalon Way to 28th Avenue Southwest; and certain other streets, avenues, and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85176, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
